nodes.text: Yoss Paldamar was a male Anomid who ran a small shop on the Republic Operational Headquarters on the planet Quesh during the Galactic War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Paldamar appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Crew Skill Trade Vendor for Republic players on Quesh. The Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, released alongside the game, identified him as "Yoss Paldamar."
